name: Magic Guide
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

storytitle: Bane of Storm and Tide: Magic Guide
storytext:
The 12th edition of the Magic Guide.
It contains a great detail of errors, but nonetheless remains the most authoritative guide to magic in existence.
